content.text:
# List of Brazil Billie Jean King Cup team representatives

This is a list of tennis players who have represented the Brazil Billie Jean King Cup team in an official Billie Jean King Cup match. Brazil has participated in the competition since 1965.
Players

.]]
.]]

.]]
